State of Elanthia

https://youtu.be/PXn3Rk0Ik1E

.

REIM 2.0: Reim Defense (Not to be confused with Reim 1.0) - Adding a free premium 1x day entry. - You may have to choose which instance to go into 1x/day - they haven't decided if it's 1 free entry into each. (We should probably ask for it to be 1x to each.)

.

Weighting & Padding:
- Currently takes up a weighting/padding "spot" - They are moving weighting/padding to it's own spot to open up more abilities.
- "Flaring claidhmores" - "Blessable + Weighting"

They will be offering more weighting/padding services so it's not always locked behind a pay wall. (Aug-Sept time frame)

.

Duskruin:
- There will be NEW 3v3 matches (3 players versus 3 creatures) - Individual Rewards - New high end item for sale: The coraesine relic - "Probably" cheaper weighting/padding certificates because it will be based upon your item.

.

Ebon Gate: - Moving to a new area. - We created a lich through the necropolis. - New story - New area -- Caligos Isle - Will travel via boat(quest transport) - Everyone will be able to go and enjoy it, but there will be different ticket options. - New "Stuff" -- Deep sea diving - New type of game - Digging! (On a beach) - No unlimited digging - You'll need to buy entries similiar to duskruin entries. - GM Haliste will talk about it more - Dates for EG? -- "All of October" w/ a Merchant Week. - Quest to get to the island, everyone can participate. - "Shop Pass" - to enter a shop (Probably around $10) - Games will have an additional cost. - "Seashells" as tickets - Will be able to buy things for silver - New lesser spirit Arkati - New quest item you can build up over years - Carousel plans are in discussion (Key to the Midway is not at the new venue)

.

Will creatures be updated to account for the weighting/padding availability increase? - No

.

Silver drains: - No clear indication it's being addressed

.

Disarm: - Dev round table

.

Transportation Reviews: - Dev round table

.

New Capped Area: - Ideas are being discussed. - Not 3 years, but no specific time frame. - West of the Dragonspine

.

Any plans for GOS capped creatures outside of warcamps. - No current plans - Confluence earth elementals are a hated enemy.

.

Any plans for Zealot work with hurling? - Dev round table

.

Player Suggestion - Expansions for the clothing system? - No - Wyrom has an idea for a way to hide items without needing a concealer.

.

Doughtman's Challenge: - Thinking of a way to resurrect it. - Creating items for it is painful because 1000+ items mostly fell on one person to create.

.

Player Suggestion - Account bound benefits: - Win a quest - Your character earns "5 points of weighting"

.

Private property: - List of upgrades is being worked on, trying to find options that work for the SimuCoin shop.
